text: Kwa lyene ligongolyo tunakwaatendela eja a Nnungu mobha gowe, pabha putwannungushiyenje ntenga gwa a Nnungu mmanganya mwashinkuupilikanishiyanga niposhela, nngabha malinga ntenga uka mundu, ikabhe malinga kweli ntenga gwa a Nnungu. Na gwene ntenga gula, ni utenda liengo mmitima jenunji mmanganyanji nkukulupalilanga.
